title: It’s All About Practice!
detail_text: <:th_ch0105/>Riko-chaaan, let’s go practice~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Wawaah, I’m sorry, You-chan, just give me 30 more seconds!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Of course! Huh, are you playing a mobile game, Riko-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Yeah.... Aaaah~, I failed again~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>It’s rare to see you playing a game, Riko-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Rina-chan told me about this game the other day, and I’ve been really into it. It’s a rhythm game, and the very hard difficulty is so hard that I haven’t been able to clear it even once.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Hmm~, sounds interesting! I kind of want to play it too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Sure, why don’t you give it a try?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>H-, how frustrating.... Why are you so good at this, You-chan~!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ahaha.... I just kinda tried and did it, I guess?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Uuugh, I’ll practice more and clear it, okay~~~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
